Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the village of Ellicottville to impose a hotel and motel tax
Summary: Authorizes the village of Ellicottville to impose a hotel and motel tax not exceeding five percent of the per diem rental rate for each room.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the village of Ellicottville to impose a hotel and motel tax; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
